title: Shoulder Rehabilitation Plan
description: Personalized rehabilitation plan for Shoulder recovery

exercises.name: Shoulder Flexion
exercises.description: Raise your arm forward and upward

exercises.name: Shoulder Abduction
exercises.description: Raise your arm out to the side

exercises.name: External Rotation
exercises.description: With elbow at side, rotate arm outward

exercises.name: Pendulum Exercise
exercises.description: Lean forward and let your arm hang, make small circles

exercises.name: Internal Rotation
exercises.description: With elbow at side, rotate arm inward
